title: Does Islam delay technological advances? - Quora

response.answer_text: Quran and Islam encourages any type of advances. (This is) a Book (the Quran) which We have sent down to you, full of blessings that they may ponder over its Verses, and that men of understanding may remember. (29)Do they not then think deeply in the Quran, or are their hearts locked up (from understanding it)? (24)Thanks..
